dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT inv.invoice_xid FROM invoice inv INNER JOIN invoice_shipment invship ON inv.invoice_gid = invship.invoice_gid WHERE invship.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid) invoice_num, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmDD/MM/YYYY') sail_date, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_country( (SELECT orel.source_location_gid FROM order_release orel WHERE ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid AND ROWNUM = 1)) ship_from, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_country( (SELECT orel.dest_location_gid FROM order_release orel WHERE ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid AND ROWNUM = 1)) ship_to, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_name, sref1.shipment_refnum_value service_type, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(TO_NUMBER(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value)) FROM charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 WHERE cvr1.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND (cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE ('%TEU%COUNT%') OR cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE ('%20%COUNT%') OR cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE ('%40%COUNT%') OR cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE ('%45%COUNT%'))),'999,999,990')),0) container_count, TRIM((SELECT listagg (ssunit.tag_3, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssunit.tag_3) FROM s_ship_unit ssunit INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid = sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 WHERE s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid)) containers, (SELECT TO_CHAR(ishipstat.eventdate,'fmDD/MM/YYYY') FROM ie_shipmentstatus ishipstat WHERE ishipstat.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ishipstat.status_code_gid IN ('I','I1') AND ROWNUM = 1) gated_date, loc1.location_name carrier FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SERVICE TYPE' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmDD/MM/YYYY') invoice_date, 'DN' || j.job_xid bl_num, j.attribute5 mbl_num FROM job j WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID

SELECT a.shipment_cost_seqno, a.sell_cost_type, (CASE WHEN a.cost_type = 'B' OR ((NOT UPPER(a.detail) LIKE '%BOL%' OR NOT a.remark_text = 'YES') OR (a.detail IS NULL AND a.remark_text IS NULL)) THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.total_ship_unit_count),'999,999,990')) || ' ' || a.equip_group || ' @ ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(a.cost / a.total_ship_unit_count, 2),'999,999,990.00')) ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(a.cost, '999,999,990.00')) END) sell_cost_rate, a.sell_cost_terms FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sc.shipment_cost_seqno, sc.cost_type, (CASE WHEN sc.cost_type = 'A' THEN (SELECT ac.accessorial_desc FROM accessorial_code ac WHERE ac.accessorial_code_gid = sc.accessorial_code_gid) ELSE (CASE WHEN s.is_primary = 'Y' THEN (CASE WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PREPAID OCEAN FREIGHT' WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'OCEAN FREIGHT' ELSE 'OCEAN FREIGHT' END) ELSE 'TRUCKING' END) END) sell_cost_type, sc.cost, (SELECT SUBSTR(eg.equipment_group_xid,0,4) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment se ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = se.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN equipment_group eg ON se.equipment_group_gid = eg.equipment_group_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) equip_group, s.is_primary, s.total_ship_unit_count, s.shipment_gid, scr.remark_text, scd.detail, (CASE WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PPD' WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'COL' ELSE '' END) sell_cost_terms FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON s.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid AND (sc.cost_type = 'B' OR sc.accessorial_code_gid like '%CREST%') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost_remark scr ON sc.shipment_cost_seqno = scr.shipment_cost_seqno AND scr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.IS_COST_PER_BOL' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost_detail scd ON sc.shipment_cost_seqno = scd.shipment_cost_seqno WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT sc.shipment_cost_seqno, sc.cost_type, (CASE WHEN sc.cost_type = 'A' THEN (SELECT ac.accessorial_desc FROM accessorial_code ac WHERE ac.accessorial_code_gid = sc.accessorial_code_gid) ELSE (CASE WHEN s.is_primary = 'Y' THEN (CASE WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PREPAID OCEAN FREIGHT' WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'OCEAN FREIGHT' ELSE 'OCEAN FREIGHT' END) ELSE 'TRUCKING' END) END) sell_cost_type, sc.cost, (SELECT SUBSTR(eg.equipment_group_xid,0,4) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment se ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = se.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN equipment_group eg ON se.equipment_group_gid = eg.equipment_group_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) equip_group, s.is_primary, s.total_ship_unit_count, s.shipment_gid, scr.remark_text, scd.detail, (CASE WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PPD' WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'COL' ELSE '' END) sell_cost_terms FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment ship ON s.shipment_gid = ship.original_shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'SECONDARY CHARGE' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON ship.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid AND (sc.cost_type = 'B' OR sc.accessorial_code_gid like '%CREST%') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost_remark scr ON sc.shipment_cost_seqno = scr.shipment_cost_seqno AND scr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.IS_COST_PER_BOL' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost_detail scd ON sc.shipment_cost_seqno = scd.shipment_cost_seqno WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a GROUP BY a.shipment_cost_seqno, a.sell_cost_type, a.cost_type, a.cost, a.equip_group, a.sell_cost_terms, a.total_ship_unit_count, a.detail, a.remark_text

SELECT c.shipment_cost_seqno, c.buy_cost_type, (CASE WHEN c.buy_cost_type = 'B' OR ((NOT UPPER(c.detail) LIKE '%BOL%' OR NOT c.remark_text = 'YES') OR (c.detail IS NULL AND c.remark_text IS NULL)) THEN (TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(c.total_ship_unit_count),'999,999,990')) || ' ' || c.equip_type || TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(c.buy_cost / c.total_ship_unit_count,2),'999,999,990.00'))) ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(c.buy_cost,'999,999,990.00')) END) buy_cost_rate, c.buy_cost_terms FROM (SELECT b.cost_type, b.buy_cost, b.total_ship_unit_count, b.equip_type, b.shipment_cost_seqno, (CASE WHEN b.cost_type = 'A' THEN (SELECT ac.accessorial_desc FROM accessorial_code ac WHERE ac.accessorial_code_gid = b.accessorial_code_gid) ELSE (CASE WHEN b.is_primary ='Y' THEN 'OCEAN FREIGHT' ELSE 'TRUCKING' END) END) buy_cost_type, b.buy_cost_terms, b.detail, b.remark_text FROM (SELECT a.is_primary, a.equip_type, SUM(a.total_ship_unit_count) total_ship_unit_count, a.shipment_cost_seqno, a.accessorial_code_gid, a.cost_type, SUM(a.buy_cost) buy_cost, a.buy_cost_terms, a.detail, a.remark_text FROM (SELECT DISTINCT s.is_primary, ((SELECT SUBSTR(eg.equipment_group_xid,0,4) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment se ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = se.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN equipment_group eg ON se.equipment_group_gid = eg.equipment_group_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' @ ') equip_type, s.total_ship_unit_count, sc.shipment_cost_seqno, sc.accessorial_code_gid, sc.cost_type, sc.cost buy_cost, scd.detail, scr.remark_text, (CASE WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PPD' WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'COL' ELSE '' END) buy_cost_terms FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON s.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid AND (sc.cost_type = 'B' OR sc.accessorial_code_gid like '%CREST%') INNER JOIN accessorial_code ac ON sc.accessorial_code_gid = ac.accessorial_code_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost_remark scr ON sc.shipment_cost_seqno = scr.shipment_cost_seqno AND scr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.IS_COST_PER_BOL' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost_detail scd ON sc.shipment_cost_seqno = scd.shipment_cost_seqno WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT s.is_primary, ((SELECT SUBSTR(eg.equipment_group_xid,0,4) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment se ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = se.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN equipment_group eg ON se.equipment_group_gid = eg.equipment_group_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' @ ') equip_type, s.total_ship_unit_count, sc.shipment_cost_seqno, sc.accessorial_code_gid, sc.cost_type, sc.cost buy_cost, scd.detail, scr.remark_text, (CASE WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PPD' WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'COL' ELSE '' END) buy_cost_terms FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON s.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid AND (sc.cost_type = 'B' OR sc.accessorial_code_gid like '%CREST%') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost_remark scr ON sc.shipment_cost_seqno = scr.shipment_cost_seqno AND scr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.IS_COST_PER_BOL' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_cost_detail scd ON sc.shipment_cost_seqno = scd.shipment_cost_seqno WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND sc.cost_type = 'B') a GROUP BY a.is_primary, a.equip_type, a.shipment_cost_seqno, a.accessorial_code_gid, a.cost_type, a.buy_cost_terms, a.detail, a.remark_text) b) c GROUP BY c.shipment_cost_seqno,c.buy_cost_type, c.cost_type, c.equip_type, c.buy_cost, c.buy_cost_terms, c.total_ship_unit_count, c.detail, c.remark_text

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.ppd_sell_cost + b.col_sell_cost,2),'999,999,990.00')) total_sell_cost, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.ppd_buy_cost + b.col_buy_cost,2),'999,999,990.00')) total_buy_cost, TRIM(TO_CHAR((ROUND(b.ppd_sell_cost + b.col_sell_cost,2) - ROUND(b.ppd_buy_cost + b.col_buy_cost,2)),'999,999,990.00')) profit, TRIM(TO_CHAR((((ROUND(b.ppd_sell_cost + b.col_sell_cost,2) - ROUND(b.ppd_buy_cost + b.col_buy_cost,2)) / 2)),'999,999,990.00')) tsc_share, TRIM(TO_CHAR((((ROUND(b.ppd_sell_cost + b.col_sell_cost,2) - ROUND(b.ppd_buy_cost + b.col_buy_cost,2)) / 2)),'999,999,990.00')) crest_share, (CASE WHEN b.base_rate_terms = 'COL' THEN 'CREST' WHEN b.base_rate_terms = 'PPD' THEN 'TSC' ELSE '' END) crest_tsc, (CASE WHEN b.base_rate_terms = 'COL' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(((((ROUND(b.ppd_sell_cost + b.col_sell_cost,2) - ROUND(b.ppd_buy_cost + b.col_buy_cost,2)) / 2)) + b.ppd_buy_cost),'999,999,990.00')) WHEN b.base_rate_terms = 'PPD' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(((((ROUND(b.ppd_sell_cost + b.col_sell_cost,2) - ROUND(b.ppd_buy_cost + b.col_buy_cost,2)) / 2)) + b.col_buy_cost),'999,999,990.00')) ELSE '0.00' END) due_amount FROM (SELECT (SELECT NVL(SUM(a.cost),0) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sc1.shipment_cost_seqno, sc1.cost FROM job j1 INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj1 ON j1.job_gid = jorj1.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj1.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid AND s1.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s1.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc1 ON s1.shipment_gid = sc1.shipment_gid AND (sc1.cost_type = 'B' OR sc1.accessorial_code_gid LIKE '%CREST%') WHERE j1.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND (sc1.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc1.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s1.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD')) UNION SELECT DISTINCT sc2.shipment_cost_seqno, sc2.cost FROM job j2 INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj2 ON j2.job_gid = jorj2.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = ssul2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj2 ON ssul2.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj2.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej2 ON sessuj2.s_equipment_gid = ssej2.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s2 ON ssej2.shipment_gid = s2.shipment_gid AND s2.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s2.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment ship2 ON s2.shipment_gid = ship2.original_shipment_gid AND ship2.shipment_type_gid = 'SECONDARY CHARGE' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc2 ON ship2.shipment_gid = sc2.shipment_gid WHERE j2.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND (sc2.cost_type = 'B' OR sc2.accessorial_code_gid LIKE '%CREST%') AND (sc2.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc2.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s2.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD')) ) a) ppd_sell_cost, (SELECT NVL(SUM(a.cost),0) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sc3.shipment_cost_seqno, sc3.cost FROM job j3 INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj3 ON j3.job_gid = jorj3.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul3 ON jorj3.order_release_gid = ssul3.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj3 ON ssul3.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj3.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej3 ON sessuj3.s_equipment_gid = ssej3.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s3 ON ssej3.shipment_gid = s3.shipment_gid AND s3.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s3.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc3 ON s3.shipment_gid = sc3.shipment_gid AND (sc3.cost_type = 'B' OR sc3.accessorial_code_gid LIKE '%CREST%') WHERE j3.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND (sc3.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc3.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s3.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL')) UNION SELECT DISTINCT sc4.shipment_cost_seqno, sc4.cost FROM job j4 INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj4 ON j4.job_gid = jorj4.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul4 ON jorj4.order_release_gid = ssul4.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj4 ON ssul4.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj4.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej4 ON sessuj4.s_equipment_gid = ssej4.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s4 ON ssej4.shipment_gid = s4.shipment_gid AND s4.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s4.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment ship4 ON s4.shipment_gid = ship4.original_shipment_gid AND ship4.shipment_type_gid = 'SECONDARY CHARGE' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc4 ON ship4.shipment_gid = sc4.shipment_gid AND (sc4.cost_type = 'B' OR sc4.accessorial_code_gid LIKE '%CREST%') WHERE j4.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND (sc4.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc4.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s4.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL'))) a) col_sell_cost, (SELECT NVL(SUM(a.cost),0) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sc5.shipment_cost_seqno, sc5.cost FROM job j5 INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj5 ON j5.job_gid = jorj5.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul5 ON jorj5.order_release_gid = ssul5.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj5 ON ssul5.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj5.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej5 ON sessuj5.s_equipment_gid = ssej5.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s5 ON ssej5.shipment_gid = s5.shipment_gid AND s5.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc5 ON s5.shipment_gid = sc5.shipment_gid WHERE j5.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND (sc5.cost_type = 'B' OR sc5.accessorial_code_gid LIKE '%CREST%') AND (sc5.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc5.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s5.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD'))) a) ppd_buy_cost, (SELECT NVL(SUM(a.cost),0) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sc6.shipment_cost_seqno, sc6.cost FROM job j6 INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj6 ON j6.job_gid = jorj6.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul6 ON jorj6.order_release_gid = ssul6.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj6 ON ssul6.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj6.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej6 ON sessuj6.s_equipment_gid = ssej6.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s6 ON ssej6.shipment_gid = s6.shipment_gid AND s6.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc6 ON s6.shipment_gid = sc6.shipment_gid WHERE j6.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND (sc6.cost_type = 'B' OR sc6.accessorial_code_gid LIKE '%CREST%') AND (sc6.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc6.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s6.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL'))) a) col_buy_cost, (SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'PPD') THEN 'PPD' WHEN sc.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL' OR (sc.payment_method_code_gid IS NULL AND s.payment_method_code_gid = 'COL') THEN 'COL' ELSE '' END) base_rate_terms FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.perspective = 'S' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON s.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID) base_rate_terms FROM DUAL) b
